Combat
Hit Points: 54 Initiative: +2 Armor Class: 13 Attacks Per Round: 3 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +15/+17/+17 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +17/30
Armor Proficiency: Light Shield Proficiency: None Weapon Proficiency: Simple
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Boar Spear (+17 d8+3 x2@20); Bomb (+17 10d6+4 x2@20 R20'); Javelin (+17 d6+2 x2@20 R30'); Morningstar (+17 d8+3 x2@20); Unarmed (+17 d3+2 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: -20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dodge: +1 AC/+1 CMD
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Two-Handed Wield Damage Adjustment: +1
Acid Bomb: Bomb inflicts acid damage instead of fire and direct hit an additional 1d6 HP the next round
Bomb: May create bombs that inflict full HP on hit and 14 HP (DC 24 Ref half) splash 24/dy
Concussive Bomb: Bomb inflicts 11d4 sonic damage instead of fire and direct hit deafens for 1 min (DC 24 Fort neg)
Delayed Bomb: May time bomb to explode after up to 20 rd
Dispelling Bomb: May create bomb that dispels magic instead of inflicting damage
Explosive Bomb: Direct hit from bomb inflicts 1d6 HP fire/rd until extinguished; splash extends 10'
Fast Bombs: May use full attack to throw multiple bombs per rd
Fast Healing: Regains 5 HP/rd
Feral Mutagen: Imbibing mutagen grants 2 claw attacks for 1d6 HP each, 1 bite attack for 1d8 HP damage, and +2 Intimidate
Force Bomb: Bomb inflicts 11d4 force damage instead of fire and direct hit knocks prone (DC 24 Ref neg)
Frost Bomb: Bomb inflicts 11d6+4 cold damage instead of fire and direct hit staggers (DC 24 Fort neg)
Inferno Bomb: May create bomb that inflicts 6d6 HP fire in dbl splash radius for 20 rd
Instant Alchemy: May apply poison to a blade as an immediate action
Madness Bomb: May create bomb that inflicts 1d4 points of wisdom damage, reducing fire damage by 2d6 HP
Poison Bomb: May create bomb that kills creatures up to 6 HD (DC 24 Fort 1d4 constitution damage for 4-6 HD) and inflicts 1d4 constitution damage on higher HD creatures (DC 24 Fort half) in dbl splash radius for 20 rd
Poison Touch: Touch may inflict 1d3 constitution damage/rd for 6 rd (DC 24 Con neg)
Precise Bombs: May specify 4 squares in bomb splash radius that are unaffected
Shock Bomb: Bomb inflicts 11d6+4 electricity damage instead of fire and direct hit dazzles for 1d4 rd
Smoke Bomb: May create bomb that obscures vision in dbl splash radius for 20 rd
Sticky Bomb: Direct hit by bomb inflicts splash damage the following rd
Sticky Poison: Poison applied to blade remains effective for 4 strikes
Stink Bomb: May create bomb that nauseates for 1d4+1 rd (DC 24 Fort neg) in dbl splash radius for 1 rd
Swift Alchemy: May apply poison to a blade as a move action
Swift Poisoning: May apply poison to a blade as a swift action
Throw Anything: No penalty for improvised ranged weapon, +1 attack w/thrown splash
Save: Fortitude: +11; Reflex: +14; Will: +6
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: -1
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Poison Resistance: Resistance immune poison
Magic
Spell Slots: Extract1: 6; Extract2: 6; Extract3: 6; Extract4: 6; Extract5: 5; Extract6: 5 Spell DC: Extract: 14
Magic Notes:
Intelligence Alchemist Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Extract1, Extract2, Extract3, Extract4
Alchemy: May infuse extracts that duplicate spell effects for 1 dy
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Combine Extracts: Combining two effects into one extract uses +2 slot
Craft Magic Arms And Armor: Create and mend magic weapons, armor, and shields
Craft Rod: Create magic rod
Craft Staff: Create magic staff
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Dilution: May split potion or elixir into two doses
Elixir Of Life: May create elixir that acts as True Resurrection or readied self Resurrection for 4 dy 1/dy
Enhance Potion: May cause imbibed potion to function at caster level 20 4/dy
Eternal Potion: May make effects of 1 imbibed potion permanent
Extend Potion: May double duration of imbibed potion 4/dy
Grand Mutagen: May brew and drink potion that gives +6 AC and +8/+6/+4 to choices of strength, dexterity, and constitution and -2 to intelligence, wisdom, and charisma for 200 min
Greater Mutagen: May brew and drink potion that gives +4 AC and +6/-2 and +4/-2 to strength/intelligence, dexterity/wisdom, or constitution/charisma for 200 min
Infuse Mutagen: May retain multiple mutagens at the cost of 2 point intelligence damage per
Infusion: Created extracts persist when not held and may be used by others
Instant Alchemy: May create alchemical items as a full-round action
Mutagen: May brew and drink potion that gives +2 AC and +4/-2 to strength/intelligence, dexterity/wisdom, or constitution/charisma for 200 min
Persistent Mutagen: Mutagen effects last 20 hr
Philosopher's Stone: May create stone that turns base metals into silver and gold or creates True Resurrection oil
Swift Alchemy: May create alchemical items in half normal time
True Mutagen: May brew and drink potion that gives +8 AC, +8 to strength, dexterity, and constitution, and -2 intelligence, wisdom, and charisma for 200 min
